name: Skills Matter : ACCU 2012: Uncle Bob (Robert C. Martin) on R
caption: skillsmatter.com
description: ACCU 2012: Uncle Bob (Robert C. Martin) on Requiem for C: For nearly five decades, it been C. Regardless of what else has been tried, the new language

data.message: This is a video of uncle Bob, talking about the history of his own use of the C language, from assemblers, to the current multi-core world, where he expects all C-like languages to die!
Very FUNNY talk BTW, and pretty inspirational the more it gets to the end.
